name: World of people
description:
You are the mayor of a city in a futuristic and dystopian world. The government establishing a system of proposals made by citizens. However, the decision will be made by the player, playing the mayor who will have to apply the ideas of the documents or not.
Each day your work starts at 8 a.m. and ends at 6 p.m. (for the player, 12 minutes). A pile of documents awaits the player on his desk and he will continue to receive documents during the day. He must hurry to scan them and make decisions so as not to be overwhelmed.
The next day the city will evolve in science, economics and nature according to the decisions taken the day before.

3 Game Designer & Programmer: Clément Vieilly, Hugo Teyssier, Nathan Pflier.

1 Game Designer: Jean Harang.

1 Sound Designer : Maxence Chirade.

4 Game Artists : Roman Duvivier-Prot, Marina Cruz, Thomas Bataille, Rémi Bard

Controls:    change view -> Space      ;      Mouse --> drag and drop papers
